description: This file defines the interface 'IFbMetrics' within the WPEFramework, Exchange namespace. It declares a set of pure virtual functions related to media metrics and app analytics, intended for implementation elsewhere. It includes methods for media control, error reporting, app information, and session lifecycle.

classes.name: IFbMetrics
classes.description: An interface that declares metrics and control functions for media and app analytics, to be implemented by concrete classes.

methods.name: Action
methods.description: Performs a specified action within a given context, category, type, and parameters.

methods.name: AppInfo
methods.description: Provides application information such as build details.

methods.name: Error
methods.description: Reports an error with specific type, code, description, visibility, and parameters.

methods.name: MediaEnded
methods.description: Indicates that media playback has ended for a specific entity.

methods.name: MediaLoadStart
methods.description: Signals the start of media loading for an entity.

methods.name: MediaPause
methods.description: Pauses media playback for an entity.

methods.name: MediaPlay
methods.description: Starts or resumes media playback for an entity.

methods.name: MediaPlaying
methods.description: Indicates that media is currently playing for an entity.

methods.name: MediaProgress
methods.description: Reports progress in media playback for an entity.

methods.name: MediaRateChange
methods.description: Changes the playback rate of media for an entity.

methods.name: MediaRenditionChange
methods.description: Reports a change in media rendition parameters such as bitrate, resolution, and profile.

methods.name: MediaSeeked
methods.description: Indicates that media has been seeked to a position for an entity.

methods.name: MediaSeeking
methods.description: Indicates seeking operation targeting a specific position.

methods.name: MediaWaiting
methods.description: Indicates media is waiting, possibly buffering.

methods.name: Page
methods.description: Tracks or signals a page view or content.

methods.name: StartContent
methods.description: Signals start of content for an entity.

methods.name: StopContent
methods.description: Signals stop of content for an entity.

methods.name: SignIn
methods.description: Registers a sign-in event with entitlements.

methods.name: SignOut
methods.description: Registers a sign-out event.

methods.name: SetAppUserSessionId
methods.description: Sets the user session id for the app.

methods.name: SetLifeCycle
methods.description: Updates the lifecycle state of an app with previous and new states.

ctags.name: IFbMetrics
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IFbMetrics : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
